What About Love is a 2024 romantic drama film directed by Klaus Menzel from a screenplay by Menzel and Douglas Day Stewart. It stars Sharon Stone, Andy García, Iain Glen, José Coronado and Maia Morgenstern.[1][2][3][4]


Synopsis[edit]
This movie is about young couple (Tanner and Christian) who spend a summer together in Europe making a film about people's attitude towards love. They soon realize that they're actually filming their own love story. Tragedy will strike and their film will ultimately save Christian's life.[5]

Cast[edit]
Sharon Stone as Linda Tarlton
Andy Garcia as Peter Tarlton
Iain Glen as American Ambassador
Rosabell Laurenti Sellers as Young Girl
José Coronado as Rafael Santiago
Maia Morgenstern as Sister Martina
Marielle Jaffe as Tanner Tarlton
Miguel Ángel Muñoz as Christian Santiago
Caroline Morahan as TV Host
Kamaliya as Angelica
Release[edit]
What About Love was scheduled on February 14, 2020,[6] but it was delayed to September 25, 2020, and then to February 12, 2021, but delayed again due to the COVID-19 pandemic. The film was released in the United States on February 14, 2024.[7]
